sn7.2:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn7.2:2.1: “bharadvajagotto kira brahmano samanassa gotamassa santike agarasma anagariyam pabbajito”ti kupito anattamano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosati paribhasati. Evam vutte, bhagava akkosakabharadvajam brahmanam etadavoca:
sn7.2:2.3: api nu kho te agacchanti mittamacca natisalohita atithiyo”ti?
sn7.2:2.4: “Appekada me, bho gotama, agacchanti mittamacca natisalohita atithiyo”ti.
sn7.2:2.5: “Tam kim mannasi, brahmana, api nu tesam anuppadesi khadaniyam va bhojaniyam va sayaniyam va”ti?
sn7.2:2.6: “Appekada nesaham, bho gotama, anuppademi khadaniyam va bhojaniyam va sayaniyam va”ti.
sn7.2:2.7: “Sace kho pana te, brahmana, nappatigganhanti, kassa tam hoti”ti?
sn7.2:2.8: “Sace te, bho gotama, nappatigganhanti, amhakameva tam hoti”ti.
sn7.2:2.9: “Evameva kho, brahmana, yam tvam amhe anakkosante akkosasi, arosente rosesi, abhandante bhandasi, tam te mayam nappatigganhama.
sn7.2:3.1: Yo kho, brahmana, akkosantam paccakkosati, rosentam patiroseti, bhandantam patibhandati, ayam vuccati, brahmana, sambhunjati vitiharatiti.
sn7.2:3.2: Te mayam taya neva sambhunjama na vitiharama.
sn7.2:3.5: “Bhavantam kho gotamam sarajika parisa evam janati:
sn7.2:3.7: Atha ca pana bhavam gotamo kujjhati”ti.
sn7.2:8.1: Evam vutte, akkosakabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.2:8.3: esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn7.2:8.4: Labheyyaham, bhante, bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
sn7.2:9.1: Alattha kho akkosakabharadvajo brahmano bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
sn7.2:9.2: Acirupasampanno kho panayasma akkosakabharadvajo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
sn7.2:9.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn7.2:9.4: Annataro ca panayasma bharadvajo arahatam ahositi.
